item.title: Ogilvy India working on creative mandate for Vodafone Idea Limited
item.author: Venkata Susmita Biswas
item.description:
exchange4media has reliably learnt that Ogilvy India is the agency on record for Vodafone-Idea Limited (VIL). While VIL did not respond to exchange4media's request for a confirmation, Ogilvy India declined to comment on the matter.

The merged entity that became operational on Friday is expected to come out with a fresh marketing campaign introducing the company to consumers in the next two weeks.

The website of the new company is now live. The website sports two colours prominently: grey and orange. The colour palette seems to have been arrived at by mixing the colours of Vodafone and Idea Cellular: a rich red and bright yellow.



The announcement of the merger noted that both Vodafone and Idea brands, which operate in different markets, will continue to function as separate brands under VIL. The marketing communication is expected to establish VIL as the parent company that nests Vodafone and Idea.
